name: Castle Invasion Goblin Saver
description:
"You're The Enemy"

This Game is about you the enemy to all humans going in as an spy to save your own from the creatures you call friends!

You play as a Goblin invading an Castle looking for your kind while avoiding the sights of the guards on duty as you may call them friend they think of you as the enemy!

Controls: W/A/S/D or Arrow Keys to Move
Escape and Enter to pause/Un-pause.
